content:
Hi, just a quick heads-up that we now have a working github workflow that will publish the triage meeting notes on https://rust-lang.github.io/compiler-team/minutes/triage-meeting/ as soon as I push them to the repository :)

(thanks to @simulacrum for merging the PR that enables the github workflow for this)
some minor things to iron out (like the sorting by date looks incorrect), but I can take care of that
